document_data.Description: ''Libris Mortis'' detailed and introduced many kinds of [[undead]] creatures. ''Libris Mortis'' included content from older books, such as ''[[Tome and Blood]]'' and the ''[[Book of Vile Darkness]]'', that had been reworked.
